name: v4.3
body:
- fix Twitter login (cookie handling bug fixes)
- tweaks to long-press handling

name: v4.2
body:
- fix error when opening some sites
- change long-press behaviour to allow saving content with external app

name: v4.1
body:
- Updated translations for Simplified Chinese
- "Prevent screenshots' now also hides the main apps listing screen

name: v4.0
body:
New major version with lots of new features and bug fixes:

- cookie handling fixes affecting sites with rolling session cookies
- keep screen on when playing fullscreen video
- "Prevent screenshots" setting
- Ability to export and import the webapps database (NOTE: UNENCRYPTED!)
- Enable pinch/zoom for websites that allow it
- Temporarily allow redirects for login purposes when opening a new sandbox (enabled until webapp is closed/minimized). This allows Google logins to work, for example.

name: v3.50
body:
- fix favicon handling for newly added apps
- updated user agents

name: v3.41
body: Updated user agents. Blindly tagging release from tablet, hoping for successful f-droid build. :crossed_fingers:

name: v3.40
body: New app icon by https://github.com/TacoTheDank, modified from the original by Steve Morris (https://thenounproject.com/term/sandbox/30514/)

name: v3.30
body: Now shows app icon, title and colour in recents/overview!

name: v3.20
body: Bug fixes to favicon handling

name: v3.10
body:
- language translations
- fix cookies being deleted when browsing multiple webapps simultaneously

name: v3.00
body:
- Ability to ignore certificate changes (for some sites where this pops up often)
- Optional Location access for websites that need it

name: v2.23
body: - Change "certificate changed" detection to only consider the issuer

name: v2.22
body: - fix build issues with previous release

name: v2.21
body:
- Tweak to actionbar colour extraction
- Italian translation (thanks to @Asbesbopispa  )

name: v2.20
body:
- ability to set custom user agent
- action bar colour now changes according to colour of webapp favicon

name: v2.19
body: - Webapps now open in separate windows

name: v2.18
body:
- Support Android 8 shortcuts (contributed by @fanthos )
- Fullscreen video playback support
- Webapp favicons refreshed each time app is loaded
- Support multi-window and tall screens
- Added immersive mode support
- Fix recursive loading bug
- Included link to source code in tips dialog

name: v2.17
body: Bug fixes

name: v2.16
body:
- Now shows old cert alongside new cert when the site certificate changes
- fixed sharing of URL
- now allows apps (like browsers) to share their URL to WebApps
- Shared or pasted URLs will now try to open in saved sandbox, unless "Open in new sandbox" is checked
- fix crash on older versions of Android

name: v2.15
body: - more bug fixes

name: v2.14
body: - bug fixes

name: v2.13
body:
- Fixed the sandboxing of cookies. NOTE: you may have to login to your sites again!
- Deleting a webapp now also deletes its cookies
- Now supports multiple instances of the same site with different cookies (logins). Simply re-open the site using the `Open URL` action and then save as another webapp.
- Better handling of root domain extraction
- External links from a webapp to other saved webapps now open in-app allowing you to login using SSO/OAuth, etc.

name: v2.12.1
body: - bumped version number for fdroid rebuild

name: v2.12
body:
- now handles redirects better when opening a new web app
- forces http content within the sandbox to be fetched over https rather than just blocking it
- added a "recommended web apps" wiki page for sharing web app links
- UI tweaks and bug fixes

name: v2.11.2
body: Another attempt to get fdroid to rebuild this project - no app changes, just a version bump.

name: v2.11.1
body: - fixed gradle build issues, no changes to the app itself

name: v2.11
body:
- New options to totally hide actionbar. A long-press on a albank spot toggles the actionbar.
- Actionbar can be hidden only when launched from shortcut
- Fixes to favicon handling

name: v2.10
body: Japanese translation, thanks to @naofum

name: v2.9
body:
- German translations (thanks to https://github.com/mueller-ma)
- fixed crash on websites with self-signed certificates
- improved certificate display

name: v2.8
body:
- improved handling of favicon so that higher resolution icons are used
- added ability to view current site's TLS certificate details
- app now notifies you if the TLS certificate of a website changes (based on the issuer and who the certificate is issued to). This can help you detect a man-in-the-middle attack.

name: v2.7
body: - bug fix: fixed crash when uploading media

name: v2.6
body:
- File/Media uploads now supported, without requiring any additional permissions!
- Improved "Open webapp" dialog for easier copy & paste
- Added support for separate user agents per webapp

name: v2.5
body:
- removed app handling of "https" URL's to avoid WebApps coming up as an option when HTTPS links are clicked in a browser
- fixed app crashes on some sites
- fixed long URLs messing up the web apps list
- fixed crash of homescreen shortcut when web app hasn't been saved

name: v2.4
body: Same as v2.3, but version code incremented for fdroid

name: v2.2
body:
- per-site font size setting
- blocks 3rd party cookies on Lollipop+
- french translation

name: v2.1
body: - favicon bug fix

name: v2.0
body:
Major feature release:
- UI updated to reflect material design guidelines
- automatic handling of website icons added
- ability to add shortcuts to the homescreen for each webapp
- added ability for webapps to use DOM storage
- changes to 3rd party domains are now instantly saved (no need to save webapp)
- 3rd party block list now also shows unblocked domains, allowing re-blocking
- better UI on tablets
- tips added to help new users
- bug fixes

name: v1.4
body: - equivalent to v1.3, but updated build and version details for f-droid

name: v1.3.2
body:
- updated xtendroid library
- updated build.gradle to exclude the release configuration, as it was breaking the f-droid build

name: v.1.3.1
body: - updated gradle build config

name: v1.3
body:
- added toggling of images
- added refresh button when page has loaded
- updated user agent strings (including iphone and ipad)
